results.content: This is my second course with Sergey and it is again outstanding. He presents the concepts in a logical and analytical manner which makes the concepts easy to grasp. My only complaint is that he does not have more courses :-)

results.content: Really detailed explanation of CSS Grid rules with a lot of practice examples. I not only learned the theory, but also could see the variety of cases of where and how the grid can be implemented and how to make it in a more creative way.

response.content: Olga, thank you for the great review!

results.content: Liked the course. Clean and concise explanation. Practical examples included. If you want to start learning the CSS Grid, can definitely recommend this course.
